short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Organize your social media prospects and manage them with better approach

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps to generate leads from social media and improve leads management. Users can easily make new leads and manage them with the help of this tool and they can assign different tags to the leads and can organize them. Using CRM always helpful for management of leads, users can easily manage leads in CRM with the help of this tool.
